pages.text: $(li)A Book can be placed in a $(l:patchouli:utility/vanilla/enchanting_table)Enchanting Table$(/l) while you have Experience Levels to create an $(l)Enchanted Book$().$(br)$(li)$(l:patchouli:villagers/librarian)Librarians$(/l) will exchange your Books and $(l:patchouli:miscellaneous/vanilla/emerald)Emeralds$(/l) by $(l)Enchanted Books$().

$(li)You can use Books to craft multiple items in a $(l:patchouli:utility/vanilla/crafting_table)Crafting Table$(/l).$(br2)$(l) Book Recipes$()$(li)$(l:patchouli:decoration/vanilla/bookshelf)Bookshelf$(/l)$(li)$(l:patchouli:decoration/inspirations/books)Dyed Books$(/l)$(li)$(l:patchouli:decoration/inspirations/shelfs)Shelfs$(/l)$(li)$(l:patchouli:tools/vanilla/book_and_quill)Book and Quill$(/l)$(li)$(l:patchouli:utility/vanilla/enchanting_table)Enchanting Table$(/l)
